DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Appetite Responses Altered Timing Whey Protein Ingestion
DOC.detailed_description: A randomised crossover design shall implement , whereby participant complete 4 trial separate minimum 3 day . On visit participant shall consume standardised mixed-macronutrient breakfast meal , follow 180 minute later consumption standard lunch meal . The timing additional protein supplementation shall vary trial , participant consume shake contain 20g whey protein isolate either preload ( 15 minute prior breakfast ) , alongside breakfast meal , 15 minute follow breakfast consumption . A control trial shall also complete without additional protein supplementation . At supplementation time point participant shall consume either flavour whey protein shake flavoured water isovolumetric beverage ensure remain blinded condition . Venous capillary blood sample visual analogue scale ( determination subjective appetite sensation ) shall take regular interval follow meal participant rest .
DOC.criteria: Criteria inclusion follow : Male Aged 1855 year Abdominal obesity ( Waist circumference > 102 cm ) Sedentary ( currently participate structure physical activity ) Criteria exclusion follow : Metabolic disease current illness Regular breakfast skipper Food allergies/intolerances Eating disorder Smoking
